titleInfo.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd and Hank Williams Jr. at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts

mods.abstract: Three color window card (blue, red, and white on tan) announcing Lynyrd Skynyrd and Hank Williams Jr. with Aaron Lewis at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on August 26. Poster features woodcut of a flag, dingbats, and a rooster.

subject.topic: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts
